metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19246 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Oniguruma through 6.9.3, as used in PHP 7.3.x and other products, has a heap-based buffer over-read in str_lower_case_match in regexec.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libonig5 - 6.9.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libonig package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.9.4-1').
